description: A comprehensive monitoring dashboard based on Mastodon's Prometheus statsd exporter

panels.description: The total amount of HTTP Queries that Mastodon is serving.
panels.title: Puma QPS

panels.description: The total amount of SQL Queries that Mastodon is generating, split out in SELECT, DELETE, INSERT and UPDATE.
panels.title: SQL ops/sec

panels.description: The running average latency of SQL Queries that Mastodon is generating, split out in SELECT, DELETE, INSERT and UPDATE.
panels.title: SQL Latency

panels.description: The total amount of Cache Queries that Mastodon is generating.
panels.title: Cache ops/sec

panels.description: The total amount of Cache Queries that Mastodon is generating.
panels.title: Cache Latency

panels.description: The total amount of worker jobs that Sidekiq is performing.
panels.title: Sidekiq Jobs/sec

panels.description: The total amount of worker jobs that Sidekiq is performing.
panels.title: Sidekiq Queues

panels.description: The running average latency of HTTP Queries that Mastodon is serving.
panels.title: Puma Latency

panels.description: The running average latency of HTTP Queries that Mastodon is serving.
panels.title: Sidekiq Latency

panels.description: Rate of queries/sec of API calls served by the Mastodon Webserver
panels.title: Controller Operations ($puma_controller)

panels.description: Rate of response codes/sec of HTTP API calls served by the Mastodon Webserver
panels.title: Controller Return Codes ($puma_controller)

panels.description: Current latency of API calls served by the Mastodon Webserver
panels.title: Controller Latency ($puma_controller)

panels.description: Rate of queries/sec of API calls served by the Mastodon Webserver, split out by action as well as controller.
panels.title: Action-Controller Operations ($puma_action)

panels.description: Rate of response codes/sec of HTTP API calls served by the Mastodon Webserver
panels.title: Action-Controller Return Codes ($puma_action,$puma_controller)

panels.description: Current latency of API calls served by the Mastodon Webserver, split out by controller and action
panels.title: Action-Controller Latency ($puma_action)

panels.description: Rate of queries/sec of API calls served by the Mastodon Webserver, split out by action, format and controller.
panels.title: Action-Format-Controller Operations ($puma_action,$puma_format)

panels.description: Rate of response codes/sec of HTTP API calls served by the Mastodon Webserver
panels.title: Action-Format-Controller Return Codes ($puma_action,$puma_format,$puma_controller)

panels.description: Current latency of API calls served by the Mastodon Webserver, split out by controller and action
panels.title: Action-Format-Controller Latency ($puma_action,$puma_format)

panels.description: Total amount of SQL operations across Mastodon - operations are SELECT, INSERT, DELETE and UPDATE.
panels.title: Database SQL Operations

panels.description: Running latency of SQL operations across Mastodon - operations are SELECT, INSERT, DELETE and UPDATE.
panels.title: Database SQL Latency

panels.description: The 90th percentile latency over all SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE queries as seen by the client.
panels.title: 90th ptile latency

panels.description: The 99th percentile latency over all SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE queries as seen by the client.
panels.title: 99th ptile latency

panels.description: Lefthand graph is the number of SQL statements per second, split by table
panels.title: SQL Table Operations ($sql_table,$sql_operation)

panels.description: Lefthand graph is the latency of database operations specified by table
panels.title: SQL Table latency ($sql_table,$sql_operation)

panels.description: The 90th percentile latency over SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE queries to the specified SQL Table as seen by the client.
panels.title: 90th ptile latency ($sql_table)

panels.description: The 99th percentile latency over SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE queries to the specified SQL Table as seen by the client.
panels.title: 99th ptile latency ($sql_table)

panels.description: Cache operations per second from the Mastodon service
panels.title: Cache Operations ($cache_operation)

panels.description: Cache latency from the Mastodon service
panels.title: Cache Latency ($cache_operation)

panels.description: The 90th percentile latency over cache operations that are not hits as seen by the client.
panels.title: 90th ptile latency

panels.description: The 99th percentile latency over cache operations that are not hits as seen by the client.
panels.title: 99th ptile latency

panels.description: Rate of sidekiq worker invocations by worker type, split out by success and failure.
panels.title: Sidekiq Worker ($sidekiq_worker)

panels.description: Running latency of sidekiq worker invocations by worker type.
panels.title: Sidekiq Latency ($sidekiq_worker)

panels.description: The median, 90th and 99th percentile latency over Sidekiq worker invocations.
panels.title: 50,90,99th ptile latency ($sidekiq_worker)

panels.description: A total number of worker jobs waiting in the queue, usually due to there not being enough worker threads or sidekiq jobs to handle them in time. This graph here shows the n-count of elements in the queue.
panels.title: Sidekiq Queue Depth

panels.description: A historical graph of the average queue delay for each of the main queues in Sidekiq. If the queues do not have wait-time, they are depicted green. They will go through yellow, orange and become red once the queue is backing up and worker jobs have to wait before being scheduled.
panels.title: Sidekiq Queue Delay timeline

panels.description: The total amount of worker jobs that Sidekiq is performing.
panels.title: Sidekiq Queue Delay

title: Mastodon Stats
